proyects.title: Futbolar
proyects.subtitle: Real Project
proyects.description: Futbolar is a web platform for soccer fans in Argentina, with over 200 users. Users can send real-time messages in dedicated forums for different divisions of Argentine soccer, fostering debate and community. The platform allows users to choose their favorite teams and customize their profiles. It also features a moderation system with moderator and administrator roles, ensuring a safe and organized environment. Additionally, it includes an administration panel to manage divisions and teams, making content organization easier. I developed both the frontend and backend of the platform.

proyects.title: SOL Kindergarten
proyects.subtitle: Real Project
proyects.description: This project is a landing page designed for SOL Kindergarten, an educational institution focused on early childhood education. The page provides detailed information about the institution, a photo gallery, and a contact section to facilitate communication, offering a clear and accessible experience for interested families.

proyects.title: MovieApp
proyects.subtitle: Practice Project
proyects.description: MovieApp is a web application that allows users to search for information about movies and TV shows. It uses The Movie Database (TMDb) API to retrieve up-to-date data, including plot details, ratings, cast, and more. Users can perform searches, view movie and TV show details.

proyects.title: Bookhouse
proyects.subtitle: Practice Project
proyects.description: Bookhouse is a book e-commerce developed as the final project for the 'React Js' course at Coderhouse. The application offers a wide range of books, allowing users to explore different categories, view details of each book, and simulate online purchases.

proyects.title: Sportscenter
proyects.subtitle: Practice Project
proyects.description: Sportscenter is a sneaker e-commerce created as the final project for the 'JavaScript' course at Coderhouse. The platform allows users to browse through a variety of sneaker models and add their products to the cart.
